Name: Wall painting: men in boat with angels
Description: In the ruins of the church in Sayala were found the remains of a once magnificent example of wall painting.This scene depicts men in a boat: a long boat with a high bowsprit is being rowed by a number of angels (light-skinned, with wings). In the boat are some Nubians, sitting or standing (dark-skinned, in bright-coloured clothes). The halos above their heads indicate that they were holy people, probably deceased bishops.
